Amazon Account Unlock

Get invoices, transmittal letter, shipping instructions.

Who needs this

If you have a lock for one of these reasons:

  • Utility Bill

  • Invoices

  • Intellectual Property Complaints

  • Complaints from buyers or competitors

  • Order Defect Rate / Late Shipmet/ Cancel Rate and others

  • Other account ban issues

How It Works

  • 1

    Send a request

    You leave a request for an account.

  • 2

    Discussion about details

    Our manager will contact you to discuss everything in detail.

  • 3

    Prepayment

    You make a prepayment for services.

  • 4

    Documents’ creation

    We write Plan Of Action and make invoices.

  • 5

    Receiving documents

    With all instructions.

  • 6

    Expecting an answer

    If the problem remains, we will write a new text and make changes.

We will support you the whole way

We will support you the whole way

  • Plan of action composition

    We may write an appeal in covering letter upon request.

  • Getting things done

    We will lead you through during all the steps on the way to success.

  • Online support

    In case you face a problem with your account you are able to ask any question instantly.

Our cases

  • The issue

    Our client created variations where Parent ASIN and Child ASIN were different, the themes of variations also were incorrect. The manufacturer did not sell the goods in the variations that our client created. These and other problems regarding variations led to the ban of the account.

    Amazon froze more than $ 10,000 on the account, which could permanently remain on hold in case of our failure.

  • The results of the work

    We have written an appeal which was rejected with the request for “greater detail”.

    Further we sent several new appeals with others Plan of Actions, which were detailed in accordance with the requirements of Amazon. After sending the ninth appeal, we received a “happy letter” stating that the account was reinstated.

Cause of the suspension: Variation abuse ⠀

  • Was taken to work:

    23.09.19

  • Account was reinstated:

    20.11.19

  • Account was blocked:

    59 days

  • Appeals written:

    9 appeals

  • Calls made:

    5 phone calls

Leave a Request

It will take you less than sixty seconds. A member of our team will contact you shortly after.
